data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Menegon, Michele, Gower, David J., Loader, Simon P. (2011): A remarkable new species of Callulina (Amphibia: Anura: Brevicipitidae) with massive, boldly coloured limb glands. Zootaxa 3095: 15-26, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.202448
